snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s recent moves to address labor abuses in the nail salon industry are a respectable start, but the trail of abuse also runs deep in the construction and restaurant worlds.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York Column commends New York Gov Andrew Cuomo for efforts to improve working conditions and wage protections for nail salon employees, but holds that much more must be done for exploited immigrant workers in all sectors.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s recent moves to address labor abuses in the nail salon industry are a respectable start, but the trail of abuse also runs deep in the construction and restaurant worlds.

headline.print_headline: It’s Not Just the Nail Salons
headline.main: When It Comes to Wage Abuses, It’s Not Just the Nail Salons
